Entries.15_2: It's nice that Alex is still livin' with us. I need more help than what my dear wife Evelyn can provide some days.
Entries.19_2: I remember when the mines were first being developed. The town was so happy. We needed the economic activity.#$b#Didn't consider how polluting they'd be.
Entries.21_2: We didn't have these new electric devices when we were kids. Had to go out and kick a ball about for our entertainment.
